price: (15) Indeed, We will remove the torment for a little. Indeed, you [disbelievers] will return [to disbelief].
arabic: إِنَّا كَاشِفُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابِ قَلِيلًاۚ إِنَّكُمۡ عَآئِدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: innā kāshifū al-ʿadhābi qalīlan innakum ʿāidūna
